catCow.title: Cat-Cow Stretch
catCow.description: On hands and knees, alternately round your back up (cat) and drop the belly to arch the back (cow). This moves the spine through flexion and extension, stretching abdominal, shoulder, neck, gluteal and hip-flexor muscles.

video.title: Cat-Cow Spinal Mobility
video.description: Spinal flexion and extension movement for morning mobility

sideBend.title: Standing Side Bend
sideBend.description: Stand with feet together, raise both arms, then lower one arm and bend the body toward that side. Stretches the oblique muscles and latissimus, helping detect side-specific restrictions.

video.title: Standing Lateral Flexion
video.description: Lateral trunk stretching for oblique muscles and spinal mobility

forwardBend.title: Standing Forward Bend
forwardBend.description: Stand tall, hinge at the hips to fold forward toward the toes, keeping a soft knee bend. This stretch targets hamstrings, calves and the lower back, helping assess neural tension.

video.title: Standing Forward Fold
video.description: Hamstring and posterior chain stretch with neural assessment

hipFlexor.title: Half-Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
hipFlexor.description: From a half-kneeling lunge, slide the back knee slightly backward, squeeze the glute on the kneeling leg and tilt the pelvis forward. Stretches the iliopsoas and addresses anterior pelvic tilt.

video.title: Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
video.description: Targeted iliopsoas stretch for hip mobility and posture

calfStretch.title: Calf Stretch
calfStretch.description: Hold onto a support, place one leg back with heel on the floor and lean forward until a stretch is felt in the calf. Targets gastrocnemius and soleus muscles for ankle mobility.

video.title: Standing Calf Stretch
video.description: Gastrocnemius and soleus stretch for lower leg mobility

downwardDog.title: Downward-Facing Dog
downwardDog.description: From a push-up position, lift hips to create an inverted V, press heels toward the floor and keep arms straight. Global posterior chain stretch for shoulders, hamstrings, calves and glutes.

video.title: Downward-Facing Dog Pose
video.description: Full-body posterior chain stretch and shoulder mobility
